backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining custom OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, and root mounting element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all main pages including Pests.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation links including Pests, service shortcuts, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, navigation links including Pests, call-to-action phone number, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Custom: Section displaying testimonial cards with reviewer names, star ratings, review text, and optional service labels.
frontend/src/components/services/SafetyN: Renders a safety information section with cards listing preparation, aftercare, and ecoâ€‘friendly guidelines.
frontend/src/components/services/Treatme: Displays a multi-step treatment process using cards with icons, numbers, and descriptions.
frontend/src/content/pests.ts: Exports pest data including identification details, signs of infestation, and prevention tips.
frontend/src/content/testimonials.ts: Provides a list of customer testimonials with names, ratings, reviews, and optional service types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, and login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a green-themed light/dark color palette for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, mission, hero section, and core values grid using icons and images.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact methods including phone, email, business hours, and a hero section with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero banner, feature highlights, service previews, and customer reviews section.
frontend/src/pages/PestsPage.tsx: Shows a pest identification guide with cards listing identification details, infestation signs, and prevention tips.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Provides a services overview with detailed service cards, descriptions, feature lists, and supportive sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current website requirements, features, and architectural notes for the Nexeme Pest Control site.
